SEARCH
Package hms.entity.user

Class User

java.lang.Object
hms.entity.user.User
Direct Known Subclasses:
Administrator, Doctor, Patient, Pharmacist, Receptionist
public abstract class User extends Object
Represents a User in the system with an ID, name, gender, and password. The password is stored as a hashed value for security.

    • setPassword

      public boolean setPassword(String password)
      Sets a new password for the user after validating it. The password is hashed using BCrypt before being stored.
      Parameters:
      password - the new password to set.
      Returns:
      true if the password is successfully set, false if validation fails.

    • setPasswordHash

      public void setPasswordHash(String passwordHash)
      Sets the hashed password directly. This should generally be used only for password recovery.
      Parameters:
      passwordHash - the hashed password to set.

    • resetPassword

      public void resetPassword()
      Resets the password to a default value ("password"). The password is hashed using BCrypt.
